title: A Man of Honor
description: Dominic Esposito is US Marshal and a hard-as-nails guy with dark, disturbing tastes. He's a profiler, hunts down killers, gets into their heads. He's a man of honor who is devoted to his job and upholds the law.Pretty redheaded Shauna Maloney takes on the dark, handsome man both in his job and personal life.Will the fiery redhead submit to his every whim? Dominic demands submission.She harbors deep sexual desires, ones she's certain Dominic can fulfill.****Adult Content****
author: Ethan Radcliff
